mapper.select: select bh.id, bh.user_id, bh.room_id, bh.browse_time, ri.room_number, ri.rent, ai.name apartment_name, ai.province_name, ai.city_name, ai.district_name from browsing_history bh left join room_info ri on bh.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 left join apartment_info ai on ri.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 where bh.is_deleted = 0 order by bh.browse_time desc
